name: Robots in Hell #LD44
description:
Install instructions

Hi, i’m Andrea Di Bartolo, 3d Artist currently working for Shoppe Keep 2, fourth Ludum Dare that i do alone, as a 3D Art with very little experience in coding, this time i tried to step up a bit and do a game with more mechanics, albeit simple ones: a Tower Defense!

Robots in Hell is a Tower Defense game where you have to defend your infernal palace from hordes of evil robots that are invading your sanctum! build towers and cast spells to dispose of them, but be ware, there is no money in this game, everything is paid with your life force!

Features:

-3 types of enemies

-3 types of turrets

-2 spells

-5 levels

Controls:

Standard tower defense controls, click on the ui buttons to select a tower to build, click in a free spot to build it! right click and drag to rotate the camera.
